Nandan Nilekani, the co-founder of Infosys, on Tuesday shared a photo of his phone's home screen and revealed that it does not have WhatsApp or any other social media apps.

articles.author: Sneha Kulkarni
articles.title: UIDAI Update: How to get Aadhaar PVC cards for full family using one mobile number - Economic Times
articles.description: You can use any mobile number to receive OTP for authentication, regardless of the registered mobile number with your Aadhaar. So, one person can order Aadhaar PVC cards online for the whole family.
articles.content: The Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI) has launched a new service called "Aadhaar PVC Card," which allows Aadhaar holders to have their Aadhaar details printed on a PVC card for a nomin… [+2958 chars]

articles.title: Nissan Magnite & Renault Kiger Get 4 Star Crash Test Rating – GNCAP - India Car News
articles.description: The Global NCAP has tested 4 new made-in-India cars under its new #SaferCarsForIndia campaign. Global NCAP has tested the Nissan Magnite, Renault Kiger, Honda Jazz and the fourth generation City. All these models have secured a 4-star adult occupant safety ra…
